items.content_html: The Drag and Drop API is a lightweight and customizable library that enables developers to easily implement drag-and-drop functionality within web applications. It simplifies the process of making elements draggable and droppable, supporting a variety of use cases such as sortable lists, file uploads, and UI components management.
items.title: fcrfabiano/Drag-and-Drop: The Drag and Drop API is a lightweight and customizable library that enables developers to easily implement drag-and-drop functionality within web applications. It simplifies the process of making elements draggable and droppable, supporting a variety of use cases such as sortable lists, file uploads, and UI components management.

items.content_html: The JS Buy SDK is a lightweight library that allows you to build ecommerce into any website. It is based on Shopify's API and provides the ability to retrieve products and collections from your shop, add products to a cart, and checkout.
items.title: Shopify/js-buy-sdk: The JS Buy SDK is a lightweight library that allows you to build ecommerce into any website. It is based on Shopify's API and provides the ability to retrieve products and collections from your shop, add products to a cart, and checkout.

items.content_html: An Axios transformer for seamlessly converting ISO 8601 formatted date strings with millisecond precision to JavaScript Date objects. Simplify handling of Date objects in JSON responses with this lightweight utility.
items.title: angelxmoreno/axios-date-transformer: An Axios transformer for seamlessly converting ISO 8601 formatted date strings with millisecond precision to JavaScript Date objects. Simplify handling of Date objects in JSON responses with this lightweight utility.
